article_title: Gaza most dangerous place in world for aid workers.
sentence: The  seven  aid  workers  from  the  World  Central  Kitchen  are  sadly  not  the  first  to  have  been  killed  during  the  war  between  Israel  and  Hamas  in  Gaza,  which  began  almost  six  months  ago.

article_title: Gaza most dangerous place in world for aid workers.
sentence: Before  the  incident,  at  least  196  aid  workers  had  been  killed  in  the  Palestinian  territories  since  the  start  of  the  war,  according  to  a  tally  by  the  Aid  Worker  Security  Database  ,  which  records  major  incidents  of  violence  against  humanitarian  personnel.

article_title: Gaza most dangerous place in world for aid workers.
sentence: Last  year,  when  161  aid  workers  were  reported  killed,  was  the  deadliest  year  ever  recorded,  according  to  the  AWSD’s  database.

article_title: Gaza most dangerous place in world for aid workers.
sentence: Most  of  those  killed  during  the  war  worked  for  the  UN  agency  for  Palestinian  refugees  (UNRWA),  which  runs  the  biggest  aid  operation  in  Gaza.

article_title: Gaza most dangerous place in world for aid workers.
sentence: UNRWA  said  in  a  report  on  Monday  that  173  of  its  staff  members  had  been  killed,  including  while  in  the  line  of  duty.
